name: Afro Flea
description:
Fullscreen for a better experience! 🠕🠕🠕

Afros and Fleas!

Cut up the evil insects attacking your glorious afro, but be careful not to get that magnificent hairdo in the way of your own scissors! And when the battle is over... will you grow the greatest afro ever!?

· · · 

Code by @jaungardener

Art by @fern

A gift for our friend Jorje!
